$schema.title: The URL for the schema used by this document.

comInterop.title: Details around code generation for COM interop

structsInsteadOfInterfaces.title: Generate structs instead of interfaces, allowing 0 GC pressure and exact lifetime management.

preserveSigMethods.title: Identifies methods or interfaces that should be generated as [PreserveSig].

wideCharOnly.title: Omit ANSI functions and remove `W` suffix from UTF-16 functions.

emitSingleFile.title: A value indicating whether to emit a single source file as opposed to types spread across many files.

className.title: The name of a single class under which all p/invoke methods should be added, regardless of imported module. Use null for one class per imported module.

public.title: A value indicating whether to expose the generated APIs publicly (as opposed to internally).
